titleStmt.title: To THE REV. WILLIAM BELL,The Rev. William Bell, RN, co-principal of the naval school at North Grove House, Southsea, which CD’s son Sydney attended.18 JUNE 1859

dateline.placeName: Gad’s Hill Place|Higham by Rochester, Kent

body.p: Allow me to assure you that I have received your very kind letter with great pleasure, and that I hope – and confidently believe – that Sydney will do credit to your interest in him and care of him.

closer.salute: Believe me|My Dear Sir | Faithfully Yours
